name: Datadog AI Observability Agent
description: Intelligent observability agent that provides automated incident detection, root cause analysis, and remediation recommendations using Datadog's unified monitoring platform

skills.name: Metric Anomaly Detection
skills.description: Detect anomalies in application and infrastructure metrics using adaptive ML algorithms that learn normal behavior patterns

skills.name: Root Cause Analysis
skills.description: Automatically correlate alerts, traces, logs, and metrics to identify the root cause of incidents across distributed systems
examples: Find root cause of increased error rate

skills.name: Intelligent Log Analysis
skills.description: Parse, pattern-match, and analyze logs at scale to extract insights, detect errors, and identify security threats
examples: Find log entries related to outage

skills.name: Incident Triage & Prioritization
skills.description: Assess incident severity, impact scope, and priority based on affected services, SLOs, and business context

skills.name: Remediation Recommendations
skills.description: Suggest remediation steps based on similar past incidents, runbooks, and automated playbooks

skills.name: Capacity Forecasting
skills.description: Predict future resource requirements based on historical trends, seasonality, and growth patterns
examples: Forecast disk usage for next quarter
Predict when we'll hit memory limits
Plan capacity for Black Friday traffic
